content.p: This page explains the purpose and responsibilities surrounding monitoring, its associated documentation and feedback. This information is primarily directed at staff but may also be of interest to students across all UK, China and Malaysia campuses. Includes: expectations of Schools; responsibility of the School (at UNUK); involvement of the international campuses Includes: Schools; Education Excellence team; Planning, performance and Strategic Change; Students' Union; Quality and Standards Committee Includes: template for research programmes; template for taught programmes Student Services Academic-Service-Office@nottingham.edu.cn student_registry@nottingham.edu.my Quality-Manual-Enquiries@nottingham.ac.uk Portland Building, University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD
